scripts.build:portfolio-assets: cd lib/portfolio-assets && npm run tsc && cd - && zip -r artifacts/portfolio-assets.zip dist/portfolio-assets dist/shared
scripts.build:portfolio-overview: cd lib/portfolio-overview && npm run tsc && cd - && zip -r artifacts/portfolio-overview.zip dist/portfolio-overview dist/shared
scripts.build:portfolio-migrations: cd lib/portfolio-migrations && npm run tsc && cd - && zip -r artifacts/portfolio-migrations.zip dist/portfolio-migrations dist/shared
